verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Worthy is the Lamb
To receive power and riches
And wisdom and might and honour
Blessing and honour and glory
And dominion forever
Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: o1
verse.lines:
Power riches wisdom and might
And power riches wisdom and might
And blessing and honour
And dominion forevermore

verse.name: o2
verse.lines:
Power riches wisdom and might
And power riches wisdom and might
And blessing and honour
Worthy is the Lamb
